None.Name: Heal
None.Description: Every 5 seconds, unit heals a friendly unit for 120 life points.

None.Name: Mystical Bolt
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit casts a bolt of mystical energy that deals 58 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 87 in total.
